Chima Simone Benson bụ onye na agba na igwe onyonyo ma bụrụ kwa onye odeakụkọ na arụrụ onwe ya, njirimara ya bụ na ọgbara na egwuregwu na pụta ihe a n'akpọ Bigi Brọda  Ọ nyiri ọnwụ onye ogbu-ọchụ a n'akpọ Dale Devon Scheanette na gbam-gbam isa ahụ. Akọrọ akụkọ gbasara nyiri ọnwụ ya na  igwe onyonyo a n'akpọ true crime cable television show Cold Case Files ya na akwukwọ egosi ihe ngosi nke a n'akpọ Unusual Suspects and Surviving Evil na Investigation Discovery.
